meanings.definition: To renovate or redecorate (a room or building)
meanings.sent1: I am refurbishing my old desk to make it look new again.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys refurbishing old furniture to give it a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: The refurbishing of the classroom made the students excited for the new school year.
meanings.sent4: Refurbishing a house is like giving it a makeover to shine brightly.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishing process brought life back to the worn-out sofa.

meanings.definition: The action of renovating or redecorating (a room or building)
meanings.sent1: The refurbishing of the kitchen was completed just in time for the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: Refurbishing can breathe new life into an old space, making it feel brand new.
meanings.sent3: The refurbishing of the museum attracted many visitors curious to see the changes.
meanings.sent4: The refurbishing of the historic building preserved its beauty for future generations.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishing of the office created a more productive work environment.
